articles.title: A UPF 50+ Pashmina Scarf And 24 Other Genius Products That Make Traveling *So* Much Easier
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: Alleyoop introduces an all-in-one razor designed for travel.  I Dew Care launched "Tap Secret" mattifying powder shampoo which contains black ginseng and biotin. Kenra released Platinum Blow-Dry Spray which cuts drying time and offers thermal protection.

articles.title: GPMI is coming: The new tech that could replace HDMI, DisplayPort, and Thunderbolt
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Over 50 Chinese companies, including Hisense and Skyworth, have created a new technology called General Purpose Media Interface (GPMI). This introduction represents a new product/service in the tech industry.

articles.title: Knob Creek's New Single Barrel Cask Strength Bourbon Is A Heavy Hitter
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Retailers and drinkers receive a new whiskey product. This new release is bottled uncut. This uncut whiskey gives a taste as it comes from the barrel.

articles.title: CarExpert Choice winner: Best Luxury Small Car
articles.author: Carexpert.com.au
articles.summary: CarExpert is offering hundreds of new car deals. Customers can browse the deals to find a suitable offer.

articles.title: Zo Computer
articles.author: perceptnet
articles.summary: The team is developing Zo Computer, a new consumer product described as an always-on personal computer in the cloud, operated through conversation. It aims to provide regular consumers with access to powerful cloud computing resources, simplifying the user experience through AI-driven natural language translation.

articles.title: MUSTAAAAAARD! Heinz, Kendrick Lamar's Producer Collab On Spicy Mustard: How To Get It
articles.summary: Kraft Heinz and music producer Mustard have launched a new smoky chipotle honey mustard called HEINZ MUSTAAAAAARD. It will be available exclusively at Buffalo Wild Wings for two weeks before being sold at retailers like 7-Eleven and Target, as well as online through Amazon and Walmart.com. Customers ordering beef at Buffalo Wild Wings will receive a free bottle while supplies last.

articles.title: ChatGPT: Learn a Language for Your Vacation
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: ChatGPT offers features like phrase translation, vocabulary building, and conversation practice for travelers learning new languages. It creates engaging, interactive content and provides tailored lessons, practice conversations, and grammar help. Users can improve communication, immerse themselves in culture, and enhance safety while traveling.

articles.title: Infinix Unveils SMART 10 Series, Reimagining Everyday Smartphones with AI, Seamless Sharing, and Durable Design
articles.author: Branded Content
articles.summary: Infinix has released its SMART 10 Series, featuring the SMART 10 Plus, SMART 10, and SMART 10 HD models. The SMART 10 Plus boasts a 6000mAh battery, a 120Hz display, and a Unisoc T7250 processor, while the SMART 10 HD offers a 90Hz display and a 5000mAh battery. The SMART 10 Series is now available at authorized stores nationwide.

articles.title: 33 Products That'll Make Neat Freaks Swoon
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: The article showcases various new cleaning products and organizers designed to simplify household cleaning. Some featured items include a Wet & Forget shower cleaner, stain-lifting pads, and a power scrubber for tile grout, catering to a range of cleaning needs. Additionally, the article introduces organizers for food container lids and drawers, promoting efficient storage solutions.

articles.title: I'm over the minimalist phone trend
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: The Light Phone 3 and Boox Palma 2 are minimalist phones that support some smartphone functions while intentionally blocking others. The Galaxy Z Flip 6 cover screen limits app functions, encouraging users to use it instead of opening the phone for more addictive apps. Samsung and Motorola could market flip foldables as detox devices.

articles.title: Daniel Lozano: Tech & Goodness
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Daniel Ek, the CEO of Spotify, invested $648 million in Helsing, an AI defense startup. This investment values Helsing at $13 billion and signals a significant development in the AI and defense technology sectors. Helsing aims to use AI to serve democracies.

articles.title: 26 Home Products With Results Worthy Of An Impressed Eyebrow Raise
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Various companies have launched new products and tools aimed at home cleaning and maintenance. These include items such as a screen-cleaning brush, tile crack repair kit, magnetic garage door accents, wood polish, slicker brush, and a bleach-free shower spray. The products target various areas of the home, including screens, tiles, garage doors, wood furniture, fabrics, and showers, providing solutions for common cleaning and repair challenges.

articles.title: Grownsy Unveils Exclusive PD Deal on 4 Must-Have Tools for the Modern Parent
articles.author: Grownsy
articles.summary: Grownsy is launching a limited-time PD promotion on grownsy.com starting June 28, featuring the "Parenting Innovation Kit". The kit is a bundle that includes four of Grownsy's baby care tools designed to simplify feeding, cleaning, and everyday parenting. The kit includes the Baby Bottle Washer, 10-in-1 Fast Baby Bottle Warmer, Parent's Choice Bottle Warmer, and Adjustable Suction Nasal Aspirator.

articles.title: Best Handheld Gaming Consoles Right Now
articles.author: Scott Stein
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2, which is compatible with most Switch games, except those dependent on original Switch dimensions or Joy-Con's IR camera. It introduces GameChat, USB-connected camera support, and new Joy-Cons usable as optical mice. The Switch 2 features better graphics and a larger screen but has worse battery life and requires microSD Express cards for storage expansion.

articles.title: How Long Should You Really Leave Laundry in the Washer? The Answer Might Gross You Out
articles.author: Parade Home
articles.summary: New washing machines now incorporate delay-start timers and WIFI operation, enabling users to schedule cycles remotely and have them conclude when they are available to immediately transfer laundry. This enhancement aims to prevent clothes from sitting in the washing machine for extended periods, thus avoiding unpleasant odors and potential fiber damage.

articles.title: BYD Sealion 7 SUV
articles.summary: BYD, known for its Blade Battery pack, is now offering the Sealion 7 in India. This indicates the introduction or launch of a new product by the company.

articles.title: 33 Products For When You Feel Like A Hot, Sweaty Mess
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: SweatBlock launched antiperspirant wipes designed for hyperhidrosis and nervous sweating. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder for oil absorption. Gold Bond released a Friction Defense Stick to combat chafing. Owala launched FreeSip water bottle with triple-layered insulation.

articles.title: 'We're on a mission to do good': Burgeoning Vt. business led by former Unilever exec
articles.summary: Robert Phillips and Dawn Lancaster launched Ballou Family Apothecary, offering products like whipped magnesium butters, soy candles, cold-pressed soaps, and cocoa butter lip balms. These products, manufactured by Pure Energy Apothecary, are available online and prioritize clean, organic ingredients in eco-friendly packaging.

articles.title: 33 Random Products That Will Make You Think 'Yeah, Okay, That Was Made For Me'
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Hawaiian Tropic introduced SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush, a scalp protector. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener with four shades. Good Molecules released Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel to minimize eye puffiness. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder to absorb oil and blur pores. Biofreeze launched Dry Stick for portable pain relief. E.l.f released Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara for thin lashes. Built introduced "Puff Protein Bars" with 17g protein.

articles.title: Dunkin's Mini Monsters Might Be Labubu's Emirati Cousins
articles.summary: Dunkin' has launched Mini Monsters, a trio of bite-sized donut characters named Pinkaboo, Bruppi, and Blublu, in UAE branches. Priced at AED 45, they are available in-store or via delivery in a surprise blind box of six.

articles.title: Amazon has a new membership for young adults. See all the perks it offers
articles.author: Seth Jacobson
articles.summary: Amazon is launching 'Amazon Prime for Young Adults,' a new membership program for individuals aged 18-24. This program offers a 50% discount compared to the regular Amazon Prime membership, provides 5% cash back on select product categories (increasing to 10% during Prime Day), and includes access to Prime Video, Amazon Music, and Prime Gaming.

articles.title: 54 Cheap Swaps For More Expensive Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Various companies have introduced new and affordable alternatives to popular high-end products. E.l.f. launched Sheer For It Blush Tint as a cheaper alternative to Benetint, and Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara with tubing technology for natural-looking lashes. L'Oreal Paris released Infallible 3-Second Setting Spray Mist, while Catrice introduced Instant Awake Under Eye Brightener and Magic Shaper Face Cream Palette as cost-effective options.

articles.title: What If You Could Try Any Outfit You See? Now You Can With Google's New Doppl App
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Google has introduced Doppl, a new experimental app from Google Labs. Doppl helps users visualize how outfits might look on them by using a digital, animated version of themselves. The Doppl app allows users to convert static images into dynamic video clips to try on different looks.

articles.title: Samsung Teases ‘Wildly Thin' Galaxy Z Fold 7 Before Launch
articles.author: Janhoi McGregor
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its Galaxy Z Fold 7, teasing a new, thinner design. The Fold 7 aims to address criticisms of previous models with features like an improved camera and a bigger screen. Samsung views the Fold 7 as a significant shift and a reset for the Fold series.

articles.title: Google launches AI-powered Doppl app, Helps users try new outfits virtually
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Google has launched Doppl, a new AI-powered experimental app, allowing users to virtually try on outfits using an animated version of themselves. The app enables users to upload images of outfits from various sources, such as thrift shops or social media, and see how they look on their digital avatar. Doppl is currently available in the U.S. on Android and iOS platforms.

articles.title: Top 10 Wedding Gifts for Nigerian Couples in 2025
articles.author: Gloria Adesanya
articles.summary: Bruhm introduces a compact washing machine with a 7 kg capacity and spin-dry function. Hisense offers a 250 L deep freezer with frost-free design. Maxi launches an air fryer utilizing rapid air technology. Binatone presents a stand mixer and yam pounding machine featuring eight-speed settings. Amazon offers Echo Dot (4th Gen) for hands-free convenience.

articles.title: World-renowned dentists give teeth whitener '5-star seal of approval'
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: MySweetSmile has received Dermatest's 5-star Seal of Approval for its peroxide-free teeth whitening formulas, which include whitening powder, strips, pens, and serum. Customers can receive discounts on individual items and free next-day delivery on orders over £40. MySweetSmile also introduced PAP Whitening Strips and recommends an approach to resolve consumer issues while using strips.

articles.title: This bread lasts more than 1 week, stays fresh, super tasty and nourishing
articles.author: Pulse Mix
articles.summary: Nibbles Bread is introduced as a new bread product made with natural, health-conscious ingredients, fortified flour, and a smart baking process. Its airtight packaging and unique baking formula ensures it remains fresh, tasty, and nourishing for up to two weeks without refrigeration, offering easy digestion, sustained energy, and low sugar and fat content.

articles.title: If You, Like Me, Suffer From Having A Ton Of Stuff And Limited Storage Space, You'll Be Happy You Got These 25 Products
articles.author: Iman Sakrani
articles.summary: The article presents a range of new organizational products designed to maximize space and improve storage in various areas of the home. These products include adjustable closet doublers, makeup organizers, shower curtain liners, vacuum storage bags, and more, each offering unique features to address specific storage challenges and enhance organization.

articles.title: 34 Things You'll Use All Summer Long
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The article highlights several new product releases, including Hawaiian Tropic's SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush, L'Oréal Paris BB Cream, E.l.f. color corrector, Hanes Ultimate crew socks, Black Girl Sunscreen's Make It Pop Sungloss with SPF 50, Lottabody Wrap Me Curl Mousse, Nooni tinted appleberry lip oil,  Hanni Shave Pillow, and Revlon volcanic face roller, each offering unique solutions for summer-related beauty and skincare needs.

articles.title: Thread by @WillDelPrincipe on Thread Reader App
articles.summary: A prompt was tested for Claude AI to create a marketing strategy for upcoming product launches, yielding assets like landing page copy, content plans, and email variations. Thoughtly offers a voice agent product designed for customer service, lead qualification, and calendar booking.

articles.title: Automate emails, reports, and more with 1min.AI's collection of AI tools, now over 80% off
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: 1min.AI is launching an all-in-one platform that offers content creation and image generation tools. The platform allows users to write emails, draft marketing plans, and create pitch decks quickly.

articles.title: News Weekly: Samsung announces Unpacked, Nothing Phone 3 leaks ahead of launch, and more
articles.author: Nandika Ravi
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil its next line of foldable phones at the Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9, with Galaxy AI at the center. Nothing is launching its Phone 3 on July 1, featuring a 50MP periscope lens. Google may be launching new XR Glasses named "Google Martha," heavily reliant on Gemini, and is integrating Gemini into Google Workspace, including Slides and Vids.

articles.title: Poco F7 vs iQOO Neo 10: Which phone is a  better buy under  ₹35,000?
articles.author: Aman Gupta
articles.summary: Poco F7 and iQOO Neo 10 are recently launched smartphones. Poco F7 features a 6.83 inch display, IP68 and IP69 rating, a 50MP camera and a 7,550 mAh battery, and is priced starting at ₹ 31,999. iQOO Neo 10 comes with a 6.78 inch display, IP65 rating, a 50MP camera and a 7,000mAh battery and starts at ₹ 31,999.

articles.title: Buying a Dyson is an investment — senior design engineer
articles.author: Kristofer Purnell
articles.summary: Dyson launched its Supersonic R hair dryer in the Philippines. Dyson positions it as an investment in hair health, emphasizing its long-term value and the technology behind its design. The Supersonic R was recently used at the Met Gala by celebrities like Zendaya and Chris Hemsworth.

articles.title: HPE & NVIDIA AI Factory: Powering the Industrial Shift
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: HPE and NVIDIA have launched new AI factory offerings, including the HPE Compute XD690 system powered by NVIDIA Blackwell Ultra GPUs, HPE ProLiant Compute DL380a Gen12 Servers, HPE Private Cloud AI, and NVIDIA AI Enterprise Software. These integrated solutions aim to simplify AI development, deployment, and scaling for businesses across various sectors, reducing costs and accelerating deployment times.

articles.title: Aldi launches £10 garden essential that's perfect for lazing in the sun – and even has carry-on bag for festivals
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the Crane Air Lounger, priced at £9.99 in the Specialbuy section, designed for comfortable outdoor seating without the need for pumps or bulky chairs. It is easily inflated by dragging it back and forth to collect air and secured with a buckle and comes in blue or grey with a carry bag.

articles.title: Madhav Seth Confirms To Launch New Ai+ Smartphone in July 2025 With NxtQuantum OS; Date, Specifications and Features To Be Announced Soon
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Ai+ will launch a new smartphone in July 2025. HTech's upcoming smartphones will feature NxtQuantum OS. Motorola is expected to launch G96 5G Soon in India.

articles.title: Samsung Unpacked: Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7 expected, but tri-fold tease could steal the show on July 9
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, and a new triple foldable phone at their Unpacked event on July 9, 2025. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7 are anticipated to be available in late July or early August, while the triple foldable may launch later in October. The company is also rumored to launch Galaxy Watch 8 and Galaxy Watch 8 Classic.

articles.title: Sydney Nangs 24/7 with Fast Delivery and Easy Online Ordering Anytime
articles.summary: Sydney Nangs 24/7 provides 24/7 nang delivery services in Sydney. Customers can order online for fast delivery within 30-60 minutes. The service caters to home bakers, cafes, and event organizers needing quick and reliable access to nangs.

articles.title: Google launches Doppl app for virtual outfit try-on using AI
articles.author: The Federal
articles.summary: Google launched a new AI-powered app called Doppl, available in the US for users aged 18 and above with a Google account, to help users virtually try on outfits using a digital animated version of themselves. The Doppl app allows users to upload a full-body photo or select any from a pre-existing AI model and superimpose images of tops, bottoms, and dresses from their camera roll to offer an instant virtual fitting.

articles.title: Tumble dryer compartment you 'must clean' for machine to run smoothly
articles.author: Zahna Eklund
articles.summary: Hotpoint has issued advice regarding the maintenance of tumble dryers, including cleaning the lint filter after every use, the drum once a month, and other parts at different intervals. The company stresses that regular cleaning is essential to avoid odours and maintain efficiency.

articles.title: This $8 Stain Remover Is Straight Up ‘Witchcraft'
articles.author: Laura White
articles.summary: Miss Mouth's Messy Eater stain treater spray is marketed as a kids' stain remover but is receiving a lot of positive feedback and hype for its effectiveness on multiple types of stains such as coffee, blood, grease and old mystery stains. It is safe (EPA Safer Choice Certified) and also works on cars' upholstery, sneakers and more. It is available on Amazon.

articles.title: Alibaba unveils latest AI service for images in push for users
articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.summary: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. has introduced Qwen VLo, an upgraded AI model under its Qwen brand, capable of generating images from text and modifying existing images. This model features progressive generation technology, allowing users to observe the image creation process in real-time, enhancing user interaction and creativity. Alibaba aims to compete in the AI market with this new multimodal model.

articles.title: Landmark Sunbeam Motor Car site in Wolverhampton transformed into luxury apartments for modern city living
articles.author: Beverly Rademacher
articles.summary: Paragon Living launched the Sunbeam apartment complex, transforming a former factory site into 186 high-specification rental apartments. The apartments feature modern amenities and smart technology, including Sky Glass TVs and keyless entry systems. Residents can also use the Kinetic app to manage deliveries and maintenance requests.

articles.title: Tesco's 'gorgeous' £19.50 midi dress looks 'so flattering on'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Tesco's fashion brand, F&F Clothing, launched a new cream color strapless dress for £19.50. Tesco has also revived its online shopping experience for its F&F clothing range, allowing customers to purchase items through Tesco's website and app.

articles.title: Dunelm's reversible duvet set that's 'heavenly to sleep in' is on offer for just £24
articles.author: Matt LLoyd
articles.summary: Dunelm offers a reversible duvet set made of 100% cotton with a button closure. Customers praise its soft, silky feel and chic design, while some note it lacks the softness of more expensive cotton. The set is marketed as both soft and hard-wearing.

articles.title: Johnnie Walker Takes the Spotlight at Island BlockParty
articles.author: Thisday
articles.summary: Johnnie Walker launched its newest variant, Johnnie Walker Blonde, in Nigeria on June 14th. The launch event took place at the Island BlockParty in Lagos.

articles.title: 40 Affordable Problem Solvers You Won't Regret Buying
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article features a wide array of innovative products including OPI's RapiDry Quick Dry Nail Polish for fast at-home manicures, Catrice's "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener with hyaluronic acid and shea butter, and Burt's Bees holy grail sunburn soother, which is with both aloe and coconut oil.  It also introduces FryAway Waste Cooking Oil Solidifier Powder for easy disposal of cooking grease, and Lock Laces for easy slip on shoes.

articles.title: Google launches ‘Doppl' app to virtually try on outfits before you buy
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google Labs launched 'Doppl', an experimental app using virtual try-on technology allowing users to visualize outfits on animated versions of themselves by uploading clothing images. Doppl builds upon Google Shopping features from May, adding AI-generated videos to simulate clothing movement. Available on iOS and Android in the U.S., Doppl also allows users to save and share favorite looks.

articles.title: Glowing Success Dragon and Green Myanmar Dragon Announce Strategic Partnership Opportunities
articles.summary: Glowing Success Dragon Co., Ltd. and Green Myanmar Dragon Co., Ltd. are seeking strategic collaborations to expand their iconic product lines, including Shwe Wah, Shwe Lar, Ice Mountain Purified Drinking Water, and Vitamin Water. They aim to broaden distribution and potentially introduce these established products to new markets through mergers, acquisitions, joint ventures, or brand licensing agreements. The companies are particularly interested in partners from ASEAN countries, South Asia, and other international investors.

articles.title: Thread by @nicktheriot_ on Thread Reader App
articles.summary: Theriotsolutions.com offers a service using ChatGPT, Canva, and CreativeOS to build a creative system for e-commerce and lead generation clients. The service provides proven ad formats built from research, enabling clients to scale their creative output efficiently. They offer to build this creative system for clients who apply or DM.

articles.title: 'Game-changer' fake tan doesn't need to be rinsed off and won't stain sheets
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg
articles.summary: Bondi Sands is promoting its Liquid Gold Self Tanning Foam, which offers a streak-free, no-transfer tan that develops quickly and hydrates the skin. Coco and Eve have discounted their Sunny Honey Gradual Tanning Lotion, and Loving Tan has discounted their 2 HR Express Mousse.

articles.title: Openai relies on Google on AI chips to operate its products, according to an insider-TradingView News
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Mattel is launching AI-enhanced toys through a partnership with OpenAI. Simultaneously, Google is challenging Microsoft's exclusive partnership with OpenAI, which could impact the development and distribution of AI-related services.

articles.title: Google Launches Doppl, an AI-Powered App That Lets You Try On Outfits Virtually
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Google Labs introduced Doppl, a new experimental app that allows users to experiment with their style.

articles.title: Why this Lenovo Yoga is one of the best MacBook Air alternatives (and it's $350 off)
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Lenovo introduced the Yoga Slim 9i, a 10th-gen laptop featuring a vivid OLED touchscreen and a sleek design. It combines strong performance with an eye-catching aesthetic.

articles.title: Frost & Sullivan Recognizes Leading Organizations with Prestigious 2025 Best Practices Awards  Jun. 28, 2025 00:00
articles.summary: The Frost & Sullivan Best Practices Awards recognized several companies for their innovative products and services.  Synopsys received the Global Analog In-memory Computing Technology Innovation Leadership Award for its AI system development tools, while Airsys was awarded North American Company of the Year for its data center cooling solutions like LiquidRack™. floLIVE was awarded for smart connectivity using cloud-native architecture and intelligent SIM management.

articles.title: Best Nintendo Switch 2 accessories: memory cards, cases, chargers, controllers, cameras and headsets
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Nintendo has introduced the Nintendo Switch 2. Recommendations for essential accessories and games are expected to follow the release.

articles.title: Samsung Teases ‘Wildly Thin' Galaxy Z Fold 7 Before Launch
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung confirmed a new design for its upcoming Galaxy Z Fold 7.
